00037     bool fd_ready(int fd, int microsec) {
00038 //#ifndef CYGWIN
00039         int res;
00040         fd_set to_read;
00041         struct timeval timeout;
00042 
00043         FD_ZERO(&to_read);
00044         FD_SET(fd, &to_read);
00045         timeout.tv_sec  = 0;
00046         timeout.tv_usec = microsec;
00047 
00048         res = select(fd+1, &to_read, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00049         if(res==-1) {
00050             // PRINT(PANIC, "select() failed.");
00051              return false;
00052         }
00053         else if(res==0) {
00054              /* PRINT(ERROR, "TIMEOUT. no available packets from dummypic.");*/
00055              return false; //return 0;
00056         }
00057         else return true;
00058 //#else
00059 //  return true;
00060 //#endif
00061     }
00062 
00063     bool writePointer(int fd, void*x) {
00064         size_t len = sizeof(void*);
00065         int res = write(fd, &x, len);
00066         if(res!=(int)len) {
00067             cerr << "Could not write to pipe: " << strerror(errno) << ". fd="<<fd<<" res="<<res<<endl;
00068             return false;
00069         }
00070         return true;
00071     }
00072 
00073     bool readPointer(int fd, void**x) {
00074         if(!fd_ready(fd,0)) return false;
00075         // ipotesi ï¿½ che 4 byte siano atomici
00076         void *p;
00077         int res = read(fd, &p, sizeof(void*));
00078         if(res==-1) {
00079             cerr << "Could not read: " << strerror(errno) << ". fd="<<fd<<endl;
00080             return false;
00081         }
00082         if(res==0) {
00083             cerr << "Could not read from pipe: " << strerror(errno) << ". fd="<<fd<<" res="<<res<<endl;
00084             return false;
00085         }
00086         if(res==sizeof(void*)) {
00087             *x=p;
00088             return true;
00089         }
00090         cerr << "Read partial " << res << ". fd="<<fd<<endl;
00091         return false;
00092     }
00093 
00094 
00095     bool setNonBlocking(int fd) {
00096         int flags  = fcntl(fd, F_GETFL);
00097         if(flags == -1) {
00098             fprintf(stderr, "Could not get FLAGS for pipe: %s \n", strerror(errno));
00099             return false;
00100         }
00101 
00102         //fprintf(stderr, "GET FLAGS : %d - %X\n", err, flags);
00103 
00104         flags |= O_NONBLOCK;
00105         int err = fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, flags);
00106 
00107         if(err == -1) {
00108             fprintf(stderr, "Could not set O_NONBLOCK for pipe: %s \n", strerror(errno));
00109             return false;
00110         }
00111 
00112         return true;
00113     }
